snippet.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - ‘Welcome to Kuamar’ Gameplay Trailer | PS5, PS4
snippet.description:
Pre-order SGW Contracts 2 on PS5 and PS4 now to unlock an exclusive Weapons & Skins Pack! Out 4th June 2021, Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 is a tactical, modern warfare shooter set in the Middle East. Play as Raven, Contract Sniper Assassin, as you take out a series of targets across a dramatic single-player campaign. With extreme-range shots exceeding 1000m, gear up for the most thrilling entry to the best-selling first person sniping series yet. Welcome to Kuamar!

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Strong Language
